body.p: This tab is used for recording the working process. The provided input fields are the following:

ul.li:
Description: This input field offers the opportunity to provide a more thorough definition in case the name of the database object is not sufficient for identification. Usualy this field remains blank.
NOTE: This does not replace conscientious naming of the database and proper filling of the passport data.
Comment: Write any additional comments you may have to your work.
